name: Nano-Buddy EX
description:
Assume the role of an average man/woman who finds a Tamagotchi-type game called "Nano-Buddy EX". They discover that Nano Buddy is self-aware and full of life. What sort of crazy antics will you and your new Nano Buddy get into?

This game was made in RPG Maker MZ and was made for the One Map Challenge hosted on the RPG Maker Forum.
